name: Harvester of Hearts
description:
You have slept for ages, but someone dared to disturb your peace.
Defeat all monsters and unique bosses to get to the main villain and find peace again. The levels are generated by an algorithm.
Each boss has a different behavior.
Use items that you can get from dead enemies and make your character stronger. When you die, you return to your grave and start all over again. Some Info
  • Heart gives you XP.
  • Skull makes your attacks stronger.
  • Scroll increases your defence.
How to
  • Move - WASD
  • Use Portal - F
  • Pick up item - E
  • Attack - RMB
  •  Dash - SPACE
  • Show/hide inventory - I
  • You can drag an drop items in inventory
  • Drop item - LMB in inventory
  • Use item - RMB in inventiry
  • Quick use item - 1,2,3 
    • 1-heart
    • 2-skull
    • 3-scroll
